localizedMeta.description:
It's Bounce!, hit those creatures with you ball!
It's Bounce!, bounce your ball off of the wall!
It's Bounce!, try to beat that last high score,
and win the game forever more!

VitaBounce! is rad as soup, therefore play it. Whether you want to Bounce Until The End for high scores or simply to Challenge Yourself, it's all available along with a thrilling fantastical soundtrack, 80 levels of challenges, an arcade mode, grandmas, and flying batlike things.

Package size: 29 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen
- Controller / On-screen controller

Supported languages:
English(United States)/English(United Kingdom)

Copyright © 2012 Havishamone Games
